description:
Featured by Apple in 50+ countries 

Voxer gives you instant voice on smartphones that’s live like two-way radios, but is saved so you never miss information. You can also send text, photos, and share your location alongside audio messages. 

You can easily and instantly communicate with friends, family or co-workers. Forget about separate phone calls, voicemails, text messages and emails. Voxer is faster, cheaper, and saves you time. Voxer works over any 3G, 4G, or WiFi network in the world. 

Voxer also brings messaging to a new level with receipts that tell you when your messages were delivered and heard/seen by everyone! Plus, you can share any of your messages to social networks, email or SMS using the Share feature. 

Join the tens of millions of people worldwide who are using Voxer to: 
* Enjoy a free, live Walkie Talkie - PTT (Push To Talk) 
* Send voice, text, photos and location messages 
* Play messages anytime - they're all recorded 
* Chat with one friend or with a group 
* Create messages even when offline 
* Get notifications for new messages 
* Avoid annoying advertisements 
* Works on any cellular data network and WiFi – good for international use 
* Play voice messages faster at 2x or 3x speed 

++++ UPGRADE TO VOXER PRO +++++ 

You can upgrade to Voxer Pro from within the app for $2.99/monthly or $29.99/yearly. Just go to the Settings page or your profile page. 

Voxer Pro upgrades the app with premium features, including: 
* Larger Group Chats - create chats with to up to 500 people at a time 
* Walkie Talkie Mode - pick chats to hear and talk back to without being in the app 
* Extreme Notifications - get louder, more frequent notifications for messages 
* Custom Username - let people to find you by looking up your preferred username 
* Store More Data - Voxer Pro customers can store their audio, text or picture messages for more than 90 days. 

When you subscribe to Voxer Pro, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless it is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Manage your subscription in the Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to Voxer Pro is purchased. For more information on privacy and terms of service, please see our policy below. 

++++ VOXER BUSINESS CUSTOMERS+++++ 

If you are a Voxer Business customer, with iOS 7.0 or installed on your device, you can log into your account using this app and your Voxer Business login credentials. You should have recieved an email with instructions, or your administrator may create a username and password for you. If you have questions or cannot access your account, please email support@voxer.com. 

Any questions? 
- Like us on Facebook @ fb.com/voxer 
- Follow us on Twitter @ twitter.com/voxer 
- Check out support.voxer.com 
- Send us your feedback directly from Voxer. Tap Settings -> Support -> Contact us
releaseNotes:
We’re making it even easier for you to find your friends on Voxer! Head over to Invite Friends to send email invites to your Contacts without mobile numbers. Also in this update:
• Easier photo sharing—seamlessly switch between sharing photos and sending text messages.
• Improved navigation—swipe to go back to the previous screen.
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes.
